rules: Headings (text-3xl+): Use tracking-tight (-0.025em) or tracking-tighter (-0.05em) to remove the 'default' look.
Labels/Overlines: Uppercase, text-xs, tracking-widest, font-medium, text-muted-foreground.

usage: Backgrounds: Use white for main containers, gray-50/100 for section backgrounds.
Text: Never use pure black (#000000) for body text. Use gray-900 (#111827) or gray-700 (#374151).
Accents: Use Blue (#2563EB) sparingly for links, active states, or key highlights.

grid_system.dashboard: Tetris Grid (Bento): grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6. Mix card sizes (col-span-1 vs col-span-2) for visual interest.
grid_system.detail_view: Focus Mode: Max-width-4xl centered. Large margins (py-12).

cards.style: Flat, white background, 1px border (gray-200). No shadow by default. Shadow-lg and scale-105 on hover.
cards.content: Minimalist. Image top (aspect-video), Title (bold), Progress bar (thin), Meta info (gray).

buttons.primary: bg-black text-white hover:bg-gray-800 rounded-md px-6 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95.
buttons.secondary: bg-gray-100 text-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-200 rounded-md px-6 py-2 font-medium.

inputs.style: bg-white border-gray-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-black focus:border-transparent rounded-md.

modals.style: bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-2xl rounded-2xl.

images.description: Abstract glowing teal rectangles - Use for 'AI & Automation' course.
Silver iMac minimalist setup - Use for 'Web Development' course.
Abstract white square frame - Use for 'UI/UX Design' course.
Office table with laptops - Use for 'Project Management' course.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons (already installed). Use thin stroke (stroke-width={1.5}) for elegance.

motion.page_load: initial: { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, animate: { opacity: 1, y: 0 }

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts or default shadows.
Spacing: Use 2-3x more padding than usual. Let the content breathe.
Micro-interactions: Every button, card, and link must have a hover state.
Data-TestID: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
No Gradients: Stick to solid colors and subtle borders for this specific 'Academic' look.
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl for the Admin Modal and Sticky Headers.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Implement the 'Admin Mode' toggle in the header. It should be a subtle lock icon that opens a modal.
2. The Dashboard should be a responsive grid. Use the 'Tetris' logic where possible (though for a course list, a regular responsive grid is also acceptable if content is dynamic).
3. Course Cards must show: Cover Image, Title, Description (truncated), Progress Bar, and 'Continue' button.
4. Course Detail View: Large Hero Title, Description text area (editable in Admin mode), and File Upload/List section.
6. Ensure the 'PV' access code logic is client-side secure (simple check).
